item.title: RT virat: This is pretty slick. Chatting with Nike's 10-K using @LangChainAI and @Redisinc. Under the hood, it uses: - LangChain Redis RAG template - ...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇvirat
This is pretty slick.

Chatting with Nike's 10-K using @LangChainAI and @Redisinc.

Under the hood, it uses:

- LangChain Redis RAG template
- LangServe + FastAPI

The app took ~1 min to set up.
item.author: LangChain

item.description:
ü¶úLangChain & Redis over Financial PDFs

Excited to work with the @Redisinc team to create a RAG template for developers to chat with public financial PDF documents such as Nike‚Äôs 10k filings. The application uses:

ü¶ÑFastAPI and Uvicorn to serve client requests via HTTP

item.title: ü¶úüß±SQL Research Assistant Lots of data is locked in SQL tables Most text-to-SQL apps try to convert a user question to a single SQL statement - b...
item.description:
ü¶úüß±SQL Research Assistant

Lots of data is locked in SQL tables

Most text-to-SQL apps try to convert a user question to a single SQL statement - but that often isn't enough for complex questions

‚ùìSo how we enable more complex question answering over SQL tables?

We've‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1737177596843208893

item.description:
ü¶úLangChain x Google

The official Google `generative-ai` repo has a ton of resources for getting started with Gemini

This includes SEVEN different notebooks for using LangChain to orchestrate a Gemini-powered LLM app

Dive into all the goodness: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/generative-ai/tree/main/language/orchestration/langchain

item.title: RT DataStax: Learn how to build GenAI chat! üíªüí¨ Join us on Dec 20. We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMarti...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇDataStax
Learn how to build GenAI chat! üíªüí¨ Join us on Dec 20.

We'll dive deep with @GoogleCloud's Yemi Falokun & @LangChainAI's @RLanceMartin to build a customer service chatbot with Vertex AI embeddings and RAG with LangChain + Astra DB vector search.

https://dtsx.io/3GLaMoP

item.title: RT Nazeem: Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallb...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇNazeem
Introducing Vexa Search - Get information from a given image (like Google Images). It uses the Gemini Vision model and Llava model as fallback. Just a fun weekend project, check it out! :)

Powered by @LangChainAI

Demo: https://vexasearch.com/

Repo: https://github.com/n4ze3m/vexasearch

item.title: ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to ret...
item.description:
ü¶úüëøChaos Engineering

The behavior of LLMs can be unpredictable and chaotic

ChatChaos is a fake LLM by @andrewnguonly specifically designed to return invalid JSON, hallucinate, and have long response times

Can be used to stress test your system!

Blog: https://medium.com/@andrewnguonly/chatchaos-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly-81f9612d7b00
item.author: LangChain

item.description:
ü¶úüí¨FastUI-Chat

Want to get an easy frontend for your LangChain app? All written in Python?

@Shroominic made an awesome example hooking up LangChain to FastUI (a new framework from the @pydantic team)

Check it out here: https://github.com/shroominic/fastui-chat/tree/main
